title: Antisanta outfit

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Antisanta outfit is a holiday reward received from completing a Christmas event from 2014 onwards. The costume gives no bonus to any stats. The appearance changes depending on gender.

content:
The Antisanta outfit is a holiday reward received from completing a Christmas event from 2014 onwards. The costume gives no bonus to any stats. The appearance changes depending on gender.

If lost or destroyed, the outfit can be reclaimed from Diango in Draynor Village. In addition, all of the costume items may be stored in the costume room of a player-owned house.

The Antisanta outfit consists of the following:

  • Antisanta mask
  • Antisanta jacket
  • Antisanta pantaloons
  • Antisanta gloves
  • Antisanta boots

Gallery[edit | edit source]

  • Antisanta outfit work-in-progress.

  • Antisanta outfit work-in-progress.

rawContent:
[[File:Antisanta mask (male) chathead.png|left]]
The '''Antisanta outfit''' is a holiday reward received from completing a [[Christmas event]] from 2014 onwards. The costume gives no bonus to any [[Equipment Stats|stats]]. The appearance changes depending on gender.

If lost or destroyed, the outfit can be reclaimed from [[Diango]] in [[Draynor Village]]. In addition, all of the costume items may be stored in the [[costume room]] of a [[player-owned house]].

The Antisanta outfit consists of the following:

*{{plink|Antisanta mask}}
*{{plink|Antisanta jacket}}
*{{plink|Antisanta pantaloons}}
*{{plink|Antisanta gloves}}
*{{plink|Antisanta boots}}

==Gallery==
<gallery>
Antisanta outfit (female) equipped.png
Antisanta outfit (male) equipped.png
</gallery>

</gallery>
